    • Method Detail

      • callService

        public final void callService(java.lang.String service,
               java.lang.String method,
               ServiceCallback<OpenAjaxMessage> callback)
        Calls a plugin action service, extending com.emc.rogetmf.webfs.action.AbstractCallbackAction. This method passes empty message to the service.
        Parameters:
        service - Name of the action service class
        method - Name of the method of the service
        callback - Callback object triggered on service response

      • callService

        public final void callService(java.lang.String service,
               java.lang.String method,
               OpenAjaxMessage msg,
               ServiceCallback<OpenAjaxMessage> callback)
        Sends a given message to a plugin action service, extending com.emc.rogetmf.webfs.action.AbstractCallbackAction.
        Parameters:
        service - Name of the action service class
        method - Name of the method of the service
        msg - Message sent to the service
        callback - Callback object triggered on service response. Service message is passed to the onSuccess method of the callback handler.

      • send

        public final void send(java.lang.String channelName,
        OpenAjaxMessage message)
        Sends an OAH message to a channel
        Parameters:
        chanel - Name of the channel
        message - The OAH message

      • subscribe

        public final void subscribe(java.lang.String eventName,
             com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<OpenAjaxMessage> callback)
        Adds an asynchronous callback handler for an event to which the OAH client subscribed. When the event is raised, callback's onSuccess method will be called. The OAH message that came with the event, will be passed to the onSuccess method.
        Parameters:
        eventName - Name of the event
        callback - Callback object triggered on the event
